name: Ext_R5_SubstancePolymer
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.SubstancePolymer for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents SubstancePolymer from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/SubstancePolymer|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: Properties of a substance specific to it being a polymer
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents SubstancePolymer from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/SubstancePolymer|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: Overall type of the polymer
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents SubstancePolymer.class from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/SubstancePolymer|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4.

element.definition: This cross-version extension represents SubstancePolymer.geometry from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/SubstancePolymer|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: Polymer geometry, e.g. linear, branched, cross-linked, network or dendritic
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents SubstancePolymer.geometry from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/SubstancePolymer|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4.

element.definition: This cross-version extension represents SubstancePolymer.modification from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/SubstancePolymer|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4.

element.definition: This cross-version extension represents SubstancePolymer.monomerSet from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/SubstancePolymer|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4.

element.definition: This cross-version extension represents SubstancePolymer.monomerSet.ratioType from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/SubstancePolymer|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4.

element.definition: This cross-version extension represents SubstancePolymer.monomerSet.startingMaterial.isDefining from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/SubstancePolymer|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4.

element.definition: This cross-version extension represents SubstancePolymer.repeat.repeatUnit.degreeOfPolymerisation from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/SubstancePolymer|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4.
